response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs. Given its high value and quality, it is worth $8,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $7,200. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure you receive the best possible value while also maximizing my earnings. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you with our exceptional product. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 7200}
